item.title: Diff Two Strings
item.description: How to diff 2 or more strings Question I want to run diff on 2 strings Answer https://stackoverflow.com/a/454549/3627387 diff <(echo "$string1" ) <(echo "$string2") What I Learned How to run shasum on files on macOS $ diff <(shasum -a 256 go1.15.8.linux-amd64.tar.gz) <(echo "d3379c32a90fdf9382166f8f48034c459a8cc433730bc9476d39d9082c94583b go1.15.8.linux-amd64.tar.gz") Note: there are 2 spaces between sum and file
